pkgmetadata.longdescription: Computational Geometry // R interface to (some of) cddlib (https://github.com/cddlib/cddlib). Converts back and forth between two representations of a convex polytope: as solution of a set of linear equalities and inequalities and as convex hull of set of points and rays. Also does linear programming and redundant generator elimination (for example, convex hull in n dimensions). All functions can use exact infinite- precision rational arithmetic.
